Package teapot_rocket.components.mass

Class Parachute

java.lang.Object
teapot_rocket.components.Component
teapot_rocket.components.inner.InnerComponent
teapot_rocket.components.mass.MassComponent
teapot_rocket.components.mass.Parachute
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, Physical
public final class Parachute extends MassComponent implements EventListener
Represents a parachute component used in rocket construction.

This class extends MassComponent and represents a parachute designed to assist in rocket recovery by enabling controlled descent.

This class subscribes to the EventType.FLIGHT_PHASE_ENTERED event from the Rocket.eventBus, enabling it to react to specific flight phases during rocket operation.

See Also:
  • FlightPhases
  • EventBus

      public final double weightCapacity
      The maximum weight capacity that the parachute can safely handle (in kilograms).

  • Constructor Details

    • Parachute

      public Parachute(ComponentBase componentBase, double weightCapacity) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a parachute component with the specified base information and weight capacity.
      Parameters:
      componentBase - The base information of the parachute component.
      weightCapacity - The maximum weight capacity that the parachute can handle (in kilograms).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the componentBase is null or invalid, or if the weightCapacity is not positive.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(Event<?> event)
      Handles the specified event related to flight phases.

      This method is invoked when a flight phase event is received, enabling the parachute based on the current phase of rocket flight.

      Specified by:
      handle in interface EventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The event object containing information about the flight phase.
